recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients:
400g spaghetti
200g pancetta or guanciale
4 large eggs
100g Pecorino Romano cheese
100g Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese
Black pepper
Salt
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and cook in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients:
2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour
1 tsp baking soda
1 tsp salt
1 cup unsalted butter, softened
3/4 cup granulated sugar
3/4 cup brown sugar
2 large eggs
2 tsp vanilla extract
2 cups chocolate chips
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and line baking sheets with parchment paper.
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream together butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
Gradually mix in the flour mixture until just combined.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto prepared baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown around the edges.
Let cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes, then transfer to wire racks.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 large cucumber, diced
4 large tomatoes, diced
1 red onion, thinly sliced
1 cup Kalamata olives
200g feta cheese, cubed
2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil
1 tbsp red wine vinegar
1 tsp dried oregano
Salt and pepper to taste
steps: In a large bowl, combine cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Add Kalamata olives and feta cheese cubes.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano.
Pour dressing over the salad and gently toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Let the salad sit for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish or light meal.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients:
500g chicken breast, sliced
2 tbsp soy sauce
2 tbsp vegetable oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 inch ginger, minced
2 bell peppers, sliced
1 cup broccoli florets
1 cup snap peas
2 tbsp oyster sauce
1 tbsp cornstarch
1/4 cup water
steps: Marinate chicken slices in soy sauce for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
Add garlic and ginger to the pan, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return chicken to the pan.
Mix cornstarch with water and add to pan along with oyster sauce.
Stir until sauce thickens, about 1-2 minutes.
Serve hot over steamed rice.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.ingredients:
2 slices whole grain bread
1 ripe avocado
1 lemon
Salt and pepper to taste
Red pepper flakes (optional)
Microgreens or sprouts (optional)
steps: Toast the bread until golden brown and crispy.
Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with a fork until smooth but still slightly chunky.
Squeeze lemon juice over the mashed avocado and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture evenly over the toasted bread.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired.
Top with microgreens or sprouts for extra nutrition and presentation.
Serve immediately while the toast is still warm and crispy.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.ingredients:
2 tbsp olive oil
1 onion, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 cans (28oz each) whole tomatoes
2 cups vegetable broth
1/2 cup heavy cream
1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped
Salt and pepper to taste
1 tbsp sugar (optional)
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add diced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add canned tomatoes with their juice and vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Stir in heavy cream and chopped basil.
Season with salt, pepper, and sugar if needed.
Simmer for 5 more minutes to heat through.
Serve hot with crusty bread or grilled cheese sandwich.

recipes.title: Chettinad Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients:
500g chicken
2 onions, sliced
2 tomatoes, chopped
2 tbsp Chettinad masala
1/2 cup coconut, grated
2 green chilies
1 inch ginger
6 garlic cloves
1/2 tsp turmeric powder
1 tsp red chili powder
1 tsp coriander powder
1/2 tsp fennel seeds
1/2 tsp mustard seeds
1 sprig curry leaves
2 tbsp oil
Salt to taste
steps: Grind coconut, green chilies, ginger, and garlic to a paste.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard and fennel seeds, then curry leaves.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add Chettinad masala, turmeric, chili, and coriander powder. Fry for 2 minutes.
Add chicken pieces and salt. Sauté for 5 minutes.
Add coconut paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add water, cover, and simmer until chicken is cooked and gravy thickens.
Serve hot with rice or parotta.

recipes.title: Hyderabadi Biryani
recipes.ingredients:
500g basmati rice
500g chicken/mutton
2 onions, fried
1 cup yogurt
2 tomatoes
2 tbsp biryani masala
1/2 cup mint leaves
1/2 cup coriander leaves
2 green chilies
1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste
1/2 tsp turmeric
1 tsp red chili powder
1/2 tsp garam masala
1/2 cup ghee
Saffron milk
Salt to taste
steps: Marinate meat with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, chili, garam masala, and salt for 1 hour.
Cook rice with whole spices until 70% done. Drain.
Layer marinated meat, fried onions, mint, coriander, and rice in a heavy pot.
Drizzle saffron milk and ghee on top.
Cover and cook on low heat (dum) for 30-40 minutes.
Serve hot with raita and salan.

recipes.title: Mysore Pak
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup besan (gram flour)
2 cups sugar
1 cup ghee
1/2 cup water
steps: Heat ghee in a pan.
Mix besan and water to make a smooth batter.
Add sugar and cook until it reaches one-string consistency.
Add besan batter and stir continuously.
Add hot ghee in intervals, stirring until mixture leaves sides.
Pour into greased tray, cool, and cut into pieces.

recipes.title: Pesarattu
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup green gram (moong dal)
2 green chilies
1 inch ginger
1 onion, chopped
1/2 tsp cumin seeds
Salt to taste
Oil for cooking
steps: Soak moong dal overnight. Grind with chilies and ginger to a smooth batter.
Add salt and cumin seeds.
Heat tawa, pour batter, spread thin, sprinkle onions.
Drizzle oil, cook both sides until golden.
Serve hot with ginger chutney.

recipes.title: Avial
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups mixed vegetables (carrot, beans, yam, raw banana)
1 cup coconut, grated
2 green chilies
1/2 tsp cumin seeds
1/2 cup yogurt
1 sprig curry leaves
1 tbsp coconut oil
Salt to taste
steps: Boil vegetables with salt until just cooked.
Grind coconut, chilies, cumin to a coarse paste.
Add paste to vegetables, cook for 2 minutes.
Add yogurt, curry leaves, and coconut oil. Mix gently.
Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Malabar Parotta
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups all-purpose flour
1/2 cup water
1 tbsp oil
1/2 tsp salt
Oil for cooking
steps: Mix flour, salt, oil, and water to make a soft dough.
Knead well for 10 minutes, cover, and rest for 30 minutes.
Divide into small balls, roll each into a thin circle.
Apply oil, fold like a fan, roll into a spiral.
Flatten and cook on hot tawa until golden spots appear.
Serve hot with curry.

recipes.title: Andhra Gongura Pachadi
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups gongura (sorrel leaves)
1/2 cup tamarind water
2 green chilies
1 inch ginger
4 garlic cloves
1/2 tsp mustard seeds
1/2 tsp cumin seeds
1 tbsp oil
Salt to taste
steps: Wash and cook gongura leaves until soft.
Grind cooked leaves with chilies, ginger, and garlic.
Heat oil, add mustard and cumin seeds.
Add ground paste, tamarind water, and salt.
Cook for 5 minutes until oil separates.
Serve with rice and ghee.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.ingredients:
500g chicken
1 cup yogurt
2 tbsp tandoori masala
2 tbsp butter
1 cup tomato puree
1/2 cup cream
1 tbsp kasoori methi
1 tsp garam masala
1 tsp red chili powder
1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste
Salt to taste
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt, tandoori masala, and salt for 2 hours.
Grill or bake chicken until charred and cooked.
Heat butter, add ginger-garlic paste, cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato puree, spices, and cook until oil separates.
Add cream, kasoori methi, and cooked chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes, garnish with cream and butter.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Dal Makhani
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup black urad dal
1/4 cup rajma
1 onion, chopped
2 tomatoes, pureed
2 tbsp butter
1 tbsp cream
1 tsp garam masala
1 tsp red chili powder
1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste
Salt to taste
steps: Soak dal and rajma overnight, pressure cook until soft.
Heat butter, add onions, sauté until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato puree, spices, cook until oil separates.
Add cooked dal, simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add cream, simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Chole Bhature
recipes.ingredients:
For Chole:
1 cup chickpeas
2 onions, chopped
2 tomatoes, chopped
2 tbsp chole masala
1 tsp garam masala
1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste
Salt to taste

For Bhature:
2 cups all-purpose flour
1/2 cup yogurt
1/2 tsp baking soda
Oil for frying
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight, pressure cook until soft.
Heat oil, add onions, sauté until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, spices, cook until oil separates.
Add chickpeas, simmer for 15 minutes.
For bhature: Mix flour, yogurt, baking soda, salt, knead to soft dough.
Rest for 2 hours, roll into circles, deep fry until puffed.
Serve hot chole with bhature and pickle.

recipes.title: Pizza Margherita
recipes.ingredients:
1 pizza dough
1/2 cup tomato sauce
200g mozzarella cheese, sliced
Fresh basil leaves
2 tbsp olive oil
Salt
Pepper
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with mozzarella slices and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Slice and serve hot.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups sushi rice
4 sheets nori (seaweed)
1 cucumber, julienned
1 avocado, sliced
200g cooked crab or imitation crab
Soy sauce
Pickled ginger
Wasabi
steps: Cook sushi rice and let cool.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo mat, spread rice evenly over nori.
Arrange cucumber, avocado, and crab in a line on the rice.
Roll tightly using the mat, then slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.

recipes.title: Tacos
recipes.ingredients:
8 small corn tortillas
300g ground beef or chicken
1 onion, chopped
1 tomato, diced
1 cup lettuce, shredded
1/2 cup cheddar cheese, shredded
Salsa
Sour cream
Taco seasoning
Salt
Pepper
steps: Cook ground meat with onion and taco seasoning until browned.
Warm tortillas in a pan.
Fill each tortilla with meat, tomato, lettuce, and cheese.
Top with salsa and sour cream.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.ingredients:
200g rice noodles
2 eggs
200g shrimp or chicken
1 cup bean sprouts
2 green onions, chopped
1/4 cup peanuts, crushed
2 tbsp fish sauce
1 tbsp tamarind paste
1 tbsp sugar
2 tbsp oil
Lime wedges
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft, drain.
Heat oil in a wok, scramble eggs, then add shrimp or chicken.
Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar. Stir-fry.
Add bean sprouts and green onions, toss well.
Serve topped with peanuts and lime wedges.

recipes.title: Falafel
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups chickpeas, soaked
1 onion, chopped
3 cloves garlic
1/2 cup parsley
1/2 cup cilantro
1 tsp cumin
1 tsp coriander
Salt
Pepper
Oil for frying
steps: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, cilantro, and spices into a coarse paste.
Form into balls and flatten slightly.
Heat oil in a pan and fry falafel until golden brown.
Drain on paper towels and serve with tahini sauce or in pita bread.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.ingredients:
4 large onions, thinly sliced
4 cups beef broth
2 tbsp butter
1 tbsp flour
1/2 cup white wine
1 baguette, sliced
1 cup Gruyère cheese, grated
Salt
Pepper
steps: Melt butter in a pot, add onions and cook slowly until caramelized.
Add flour and cook for 1 minute.
Add wine and broth, simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Ladle soup into bowls, top with baguette slices and cheese.
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 head romaine lettuce
1/2 cup croutons
1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, grated
1 egg yolk
2 anchovy fillets
1 clove garlic
1 tsp Dijon mustard
2 tbsp lemon juice
1/3 cup olive oil
Salt
Pepper
steps: Mash anchovies and garlic into a paste, whisk with egg yolk, mustard, lemon juice, and olive oil.
Toss lettuce with dressing, croutons, and Parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper, serve chilled.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients:
1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
3 1/2 tsp baking powder
1 tsp salt
1 tbsp sugar
1 1/4 cups milk
1 egg
3 tbsp butter, melted
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Add milk, egg, and melted butter, whisk until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat.
Pour batter onto griddle, cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden.
Serve with syrup or fruit.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.ingredients:
4 eggs
1 onion, chopped
1 bell pepper, chopped
2 cups tomatoes, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp cumin
1 tsp paprika
1/2 tsp chili powder
2 tbsp olive oil
Salt
Pepper
steps: Heat oil in a skillet, sauté onion and bell pepper until soft.
Add garlic, spices, and tomatoes, simmer until thickened.
Make wells in the sauce, crack eggs into wells.
Cover and cook until eggs are just set.
Serve with bread.

recipes.title: Paella
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups short-grain rice
400g mixed seafood (shrimp, mussels, squid)
1 chicken breast, diced
1 onion, chopped
1 bell pepper, chopped
2 tomatoes, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp smoked paprika
1/2 tsp saffron threads
4 cups chicken broth
1/2 cup peas
2 tbsp olive oil
Salt
Pepper
steps: Heat oil in a large pan, cook chicken until browned, set aside.
Sauté onion, bell pepper, and garlic until soft.
Add tomatoes, paprika, and saffron, cook for 2 minutes.
Add rice, stir to coat, then add broth.
Simmer for 10 minutes, add seafood, chicken, and peas.
Cook until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Let rest 5 minutes before serving.
